title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. E, art. 3, pt. 506 - Dental Care
content:

State Regulations
§ 506.1 - Qualifications of dentists
§ 506.2 - Dental care

§ 506.4 - Orthodontic care

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. E, art. 3, pt. 506

Statutory authority: Public Health Law, §§201, 206; Social Services Law, §§20, 34, 363-a, 364, 365-b, 368-a

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
